A collection of 250 gastroenterology endoscopy videos by the dept. of Internal Medicine of Albertinen-Krankenhaus Hamburg. Both the normal aspects and several pathologies are shown. NOTE: These video's are NOT under an open license.

The OpenStax Open Textbook of Anatomy and Physiology. The leading Open Textbook of Anatomy and Physiology. 1420 pages. It covers the complete anatomy and physiology at an undergraduate student level. It can be viewed online, downloaded, or ordered in print. All images from this textbook are included individually on AnatomyTOOL. The pdf is here.
